headline: L3Harris Technologies (LHX): Evaluating Valuation After Recent Share Price Dip
summary: L3Harris Technologies (LHX) shares have edged lower over the past month, dipping just under 4%. The stock’s movement may catch the attention of investors who are weighing valuation in relation to steady revenue and net income growth. See our latest analysis for L3Harris Technologies. Looking at the bigger picture, L3Harris has maintained solid long-term momentum. The latest $277.78 share price reflects a strong year-to-date gain of nearly 34% and a 14% total return over twelve months, even as...
